sourcesContent: Name Size Type {{rowData.name}} {{rowData.size}} {{rowData.type}} import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { InventarioService } from './inventario.service'; import { Inventario } from './inventario'; @Component({ selector: 'app-inventario', templateUrl: './inventario.component.html', // styleUrls: ['./inventario.component.css'] styles: [` :host ::ng-deep .p-datatable .p-datatable-thead > tr > th { position: -webkit-sticky; position: sticky; top: 5rem; } .layout-news-active :host ::ng-deep .p-datatable tr > th { top: 7rem; } `] }) export class InventarioComponent { inventario: Inventario[] =[] constructor(private inverntarioService : InventarioService){} ngOnInit(): void { this.getInventerio(); } getInventerio(){ this.inverntarioService.getInventerio().subscribe( response => { this.inventario.push(response); console.log(response); } ) } }
